trans-unit.source: For backwards compatibility reasons this function will try to return strings by default. If null (0x00) characters are received then the return value will be a binary type.

If null (0x00) characters are received then the return value will be a binary type.

target.mrk: For backwards compatibility reasons this function will try to return strings by default.
If null (0x00) characters are received then the return value will be a binary type.

trans-unit.source: To force the function to always return binary data (the most sensible option) then use the "flag" parameter set to 1.

target.mrk: To force the function to always return binary data (the most sensible option) then use the "flag" parameter set to 1.
